content:
Everything written in that book was completely new to me,
So before I knew it... *yawn*
I ended up spending the whole night reading it.

From unique creatures sharing the same Nebula,
to subtle differences among similar species in different places,
books truly are the key to observing all things in our world.

"Wanxiang" originally means all things within and beyond the universe.

Perhaps in the future, I'll be able to observe

the paths of the stars in the Omni-Gallery...

The mysterious sunset light last evening,
Led me deep into the library,
Where I found an ancient, dust-covered book on the floor.

I love being immersed in the library,
especially when I spread biology encyclopedias out on the huge reading desk,
